name: undetected
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not noticed or discovered: The longer lung disease goes undetected and untreated, the greater the risk of complications. He was diagnosed with a previously undetected heart condition.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are numerous bacteria and viruses that could be easily transported into the country undetected.He had been committing these crimes undetected for years.How did they get through a hole in the fence undetected by prison guards?In such cases, the illness can go undetected only to emerge months, even years, later.
